meanings.sent1: The saxists performed a jazzy tune at the concert.
meanings.sent2: Many saxists enjoy practicing their instrument daily.
meanings.sent3: The saxists in the band were so talented that they made the audience dance.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the saxists' music filled the room like a warm breeze.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the saxists' melodies from that unforgettable night.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of saxophone players.
meanings.sent1: Her saxists friends formed a band together.
meanings.sent2: The saxists community is very supportive of new musicians.
meanings.sent3: The saxists attire for the concert was stylish and cool.
meanings.sent4: The saxists' passion for music was evident in every note they played.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sweet sound of saxists playing in harmony.
